title: Rates of Change - average ROC on intervals

content.question: <math alttext="0 less or equal than x less or equal than 1"><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>1</mn></math><math alttext="1 less or equal than x less or equal than 4"><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>4</mn></math><math alttext="4 less or equal than x less or equal than 8"><mn>4</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>8</mn></math><math alttext="8 less or equal than x less or equal than 10"><mn>8</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>10</mn></math>Average Rate of Change<math alttext="10"><mn>10</mn></math><math alttext="negative 5"><mo>-</mo><mn>5</mn></math><math alttext="2"><mn>2</mn></math><math alttext="6"><mn>6</mn></math> ​The table gives the average rates of change of a function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> over different intervals. On which of the intervals does the function increase the most?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="0 less or equal than x less or equal than 1"><mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>1</mn></math>
​<math alttext="1 less or equal than x less or equal than 4"><mn>1</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>4</mn></math>
​<math alttext="4 less or equal than x less or equal than 8"><mn>4</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>8</mn></math>
​<math alttext="8 less or equal than x less or equal than 10"><mn>8</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>10</mn></math>

content.answer: ​<math alttext="8 less or equal than x less or equal than 10"><mn>8</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>10</mn></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify information from graphical, numerical, analytical, and verbal representations to answer a question or construct a model, with and without technology.
